name: My Very First Videogame - Maleficent Maze
name_original: My Very First Videogame - Maleficent Maze
description:
My Very First Videogame - Maleficent Maze

This gem is dated back to 2015, when I started learning game development in Unity

It was my first videogame ever made from scratch. It's not that original, but at least it is not  a PONG bootleg (which I also made before)

I won't promise a fun nor extended gameplay, yet I'm still very proud of my first steps 

CONTROLS  
'Arrows' to move
'Space' to (?)
